comments_since_last_sample.body: I live in vandunmedu where the the prime location &  main harvesting area of cardamom (A zone ), we have few acres of cardamom and has cardamom business, but honestly speaking right now it’s not at all worthy due to production cost, fertiliser cost on top and current climate disasters .
I am a cardamom planter.
